methods.name: public String getInput()
methods.comment:
* Returns the input string.
     *
     * @return  The input string

methods.name: public String getReason()
methods.comment:
* Returns a string explaining why the input string could not be parsed.
     *
     * @return  The reason string

methods.name: public int getIndex()
methods.comment:
* Returns an index into the input string of the position at which the
     * parse error occurred, or {@code -1} if this position is not known.
     *
     * @return  The error index

methods.name: public String getMessage()
methods.comment:
* Returns a string describing the parse error.  The resulting string
     * consists of the reason string followed by a colon character
     * ({@code ':'}), a space, and the input string.  If the error index is
     * defined then the string {@code " at index "} followed by the index, in
     * decimal, is inserted after the reason string and before the colon
     * character.
     *
     * @return  A string describing the parse error
